ygData.subject: Re: The server is not responding...!

Me no prob, but sometimes kenna bad lag. Me using Cyberway infinity too.

Terence Tan Kar Chuan wrote:

> Hi, Terence here. This is my second post so please pardon my sudden
> intrusion. Since the last update, I have been getting disconnected
> from the server 7 or 8 times in an hour. Verant says that it might be
> the Snet (I think it is an ISP in US) and its routers problem. Does
> our ISPs (SingNET, Pacific NET and Cyberway) use their routers? I am
> using Cyberway i.infinity plan btw. Any Cyberway subscribers having
> the same problem when playing EQ?
